name: PatientsAge65OrOlderInSNPOrLongTermCare
title: Patients Age 65 or Older in SNP or Long Term Care
description:
Note that there are two values sets for SNP or Long Term Care. The difference is the age - one is 65 or older, the other is 66 or older.
Remove G9898 from value set name so that additional codes can be added and be more inclusive.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: G codes to identify patients in special needs plans or residing in long-term care facilities),(Data Element Scope: Exclusionary criteria in many quality measures),(Inclusion Criteria: Codes that meet full definition: Patients age 65 and older in Institutional Special Needs Plan (SNP) or residing in long-term-care with a POS code 32, 33, 34, 54, or 56 for more than 90 days during the measurement period.),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
